name: ultrarunai
description: After settling in the UK for a year, I unexpectedly found myself registered for the UTS 100K (Ultra Trail Snowdonia Eryri by UTMB)—thanks to my wife, who signed me up without much say in the matter. Despite dealing with multiple injuries and a lack of recent racing experience, my ITRA index still stands at 772, but it's set to expire soon if I don’t compete.
